pkgmetadata.longdescription: Derivative Free Gradient Projection Factor Rotation // Derivative Free Gradient Projection Algorithms for Factor Rotation. For more details see ?GPArotateDF. Theory for these functions can be found in the following publications: Jennrich (2004) doi:10.1007/BF02295647. Bernaards and Jennrich (2005) doi:10.1177/0013164404272507.
